alert.note: Alert for Grant; Haskell; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 6:56PM CDT until April 22 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... Northern Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Haskell County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Moscow, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hickok and Ryus around 710 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
